content: this pattern is crocheted in individual rounds you can use any yarn and color that you like use suggested size hook for the chosen yarn i used yarn and colors must have on hook 3 5 mm my coasters measure 10 cm i used 5 colors but only 2 colors is possible too you need to change color every other round with the yardage mentioned you should be able to make 6 coasters the holder and the lid i used mainly scraps of yarn find the tutorial for a coaster in this video https //youtu be/zygdcggbdjk
